item.title: Trump loses bid to overturn $83.3 million judgment in E. Jean Carroll defamation case
item.description: Carroll has accused Trump of defaming her in statements denying her accusation that he raped her decades earlier in a New York City department store.

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court for emergency order to keep billions of dollars in foreign aid frozen
item.description: The Trump administration asked the Supreme Court for an emergency order to keep billions of dollars in foreign aid frozen.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent warns of massive refunds if the Supreme Court voids Trump tariffs
item.description: Bessent has warned that a delayed ruling "could result in a scenario in which $750 billion-$1 trillion in tariffs have already been collected."

item.title: French prime minister faces the axe as lawmakers prepare to hold confidence vote
item.description: Prime Minister Bayrou has failed to win over enough opposition lawmakers to his proposals to make around 44 billion euros ($51.3 billion) in budget cu...

item.title: Trump ready for 'phase two' of Russia sanctions over Ukraine conflict
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday he is ready to move to a second phase of sanctioning Russia.
